00044 class DLL_EXPORT QBtDevice

00048     
00049     enum DeviceMajor
00050     {
00051         Uncategorized,  //Uncategorized device
00052         Computer,               //Computer device
00053         Phone,                  //Phone device
00054         LANAccess,              //Some form of a local area network router
00055         AudioVideo,             //Audio / Video device
00056         Peripheral,             //Mouse, Joystick, Keyboard
00057         Imaging,                //Camera or Scanner device
00058         Wearable,               //Wearable Device
00059         Toy,                    //Toy device
00060         Miscellaneous   //Miscellaneous device
00061     };
